description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 7 (Landscaping Plan) of planning permission reference 16299/APP/2023/3691 dated 23-12-2024 for Variation of Condition 7 (Landscape Scheme), Condition 10 (Accessible Car Parking), Condition 11 (Car Parking), Condition 13 (materials), Condition 17 (Hours of Delivery), and Condition 23 (Use of Site) of planning permission reference 16299/R/93/0504, dated 14.01.94 ('Redevelopment of site with two units for non-food retail purposes including service and access from Warwick Place and public access via Harefield Road'), to allow for a change of operation and type of goods sold; amend hours of deliveries; reduce the number of car parking spaces; and amendments and reconfiguration to layout (no increase in floorspace).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: FORMER WICKES AND HALFORDS, LAND OFF HAREFIELD ROAD
